casebody.data:
Homero CERVANTES, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Arthur G. SPICKERMAN, Defendant-Appellant. No. 71-1106.

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Sept. 28, 1971. William Duncan, Kemp, Smith, White, Duncan & Hammond, El Paso, Tex., for defendant-appellant. Ramon Ramos, Jr., El Paso, Tex., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before GEWIN, GOLDBERG, and DYER, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York, 5 Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1
